channel.title: Water Wing Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Water Wing Village" - The Village Hidden in Water.

item.title: Water Wing Village
item.content:encoded:
Hello All.

My name is Yoshio of the Water Wing Village. I am the Nidaime Kage (2nd in command) to our leader Shodai Kage Kenpachi1.

We are currently seeking members to help us grow as a village. We currently have 24 and need more people that are active and want to help us grow. We are active in the NWW and currently possess 15 upgrades that includes the Jonin council for Special Jonin looking to move up to Jonin.

Our membership is open and the more members we have the better! Genin, Chunin, Special Jonin, Jonin, Sannin, it doesn't matter!

If you would like to join us, please apply. Applications are currently being accepted. If you have any questions, feel free to ask here.

Let's go strong together!

Thanks!
